 2.2 - ENOUGH TIME
INTERRUPTIONS(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

Interruptions can be postponed or suppressed by the user, except interruptions
involving an emergency. 

These websites...

Provide users enough time to read and use content.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
 Example 1. Setting user preferences 

The preferences page of a Web portal includes an option to postpone all updates
and alerts until the end of the current session, except for alerts concerning
emergencies.
